about_the_game:
❤ Synopsis of the story

Hot summer, it seems to do what can not lift the spirit.
I decided to take a trip to a nearby town to relax myself after a short break of writing classes after a season.
In addition to hot spring fireworks summer festival, still appeared suddenly show good beautiful owner's wife, crisis feeling burst the thousand beautiful and Nana table, will make what unexpected move...

❤ You will get

More elaborate story volume
Friendship & love double interweave, refuse redundancy! Love stories between adults
A little romance, a little sadness, and tons of sweet interaction are all necessary to create a pure relationship

⭐ Big project! Part of CG can change clothes at any time! ⭐ [/] [/]
In honor of programmer hair... Don't miss this feature!

Richer bonus gifts

Additional content full dubbing, unlock more patterns, more gameplay ~

Beautiful dynamic vertical drawing with multiple dynamic CG

New Bathrobe and Spa stand painting, more special dress stand painting waiting to unlock ❤

Familiar painting style, familiar enjoyment

Acclaimed ADOG signboard painting style, the continuation of the fresh and bright picture, to create a pleasant visual experience
Already kowtowing to art. JPG

Support simple Chinese, English, Japanese switching
Perfect CG appreciation mode and achievement system

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

detailed_description:
❤ Synopsis of the story

Hot summer, it seems to do what can not lift the spirit.
I decided to take a trip to a nearby town to relax myself after a short break of writing classes after a season.
In addition to hot spring fireworks summer festival, still appeared suddenly show good beautiful owner's wife, crisis feeling burst the thousand beautiful and Nana table, will make what unexpected move...

❤ You will get

More elaborate story volume
Friendship & love double interweave, refuse redundancy! Love stories between adults
A little romance, a little sadness, and tons of sweet interaction are all necessary to create a pure relationship

⭐ Big project! Part of CG can change clothes at any time! ⭐ [/] [/]
In honor of programmer hair... Don't miss this feature!

Richer bonus gifts

Additional content full dubbing, unlock more patterns, more gameplay ~

Beautiful dynamic vertical drawing with multiple dynamic CG

New Bathrobe and Spa stand painting, more special dress stand painting waiting to unlock ❤

Familiar painting style, familiar enjoyment

Acclaimed ADOG signboard painting style, the continuation of the fresh and bright picture, to create a pleasant visual experience
Already kowtowing to art. JPG

Support simple Chinese, English, Japanese switching
Perfect CG appreciation mode and achievement system

  • Memory: 4 MB RAM

short_description: "Take advantage of a rare vacation opportunity and have a pleasant trip instead!" With the hope of walking hand in hand with the beloved, the summer poem with small entanglements in the lively laughter is launched here!
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
